mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MarketBoard ORDER BY mbNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MarketBoard(mbNum,memberNum, mbType, mbTitle, mbPrice, mbContent, mbImage1,mbAddrBasic,mbLongitude, mbLatitude, mbImageCount, mbLookCount) values(marketBoard_seq.NEXTVAL,#{memberNum},#{mbType}, #{mbTitle}, #{mbPrice}, #{mbContent}, #{mbImage1}, #{mbAddrBasic}, #{mbLongitude}, #{mbLatitude},#{mbImageCount},#{mbLookCount})
